mapper.select: SELECT fms.perentid perentid,fms.maintenanceid maintenanceid, fms.priority priority,fms.entnyname entnyname,fms.unit unit,fms.mid `mid`,sd.todayaccomplish todayaccomplish,sd.describe 'describe',sd.dayScheduid dayScheduid FROM (SELECT fm.perentid perentid,fm.maintenanceid maintenanceid, fm.priority priority,fm.entnyname entnyname,fm.unit unit,fm.codeno codeno,ms.plannedvolume plannedvolume,ms.mid `mid`,ms.date `date` FROM t_f_maintenance fm JOIN (SELECT tmua.mid AS 'authortyMId' ,tmua.authority,tfm.priority FROM t_m_user_authority tmua join t_f_maintenance tfm on tmua.mid = tfm.maintenanceid WHERE tmua.uid=#{uid}) b on fm.maintenanceid=b.authortyMId or fm.priority like CONCAT(b.priority,'.%') LEFT JOIN t_month_schedule ms ON fm.maintenanceid = ms.fid WHERE ms.date = #{date}) fms LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_s_daystatement WHERE DAY = #{day}) sd ON sd.monthscheduleid = fms.mid ORDER BY fms.codeno ASC
